author: dbertoni
msg: Added support for extra configuration options and removed support for unused ones.  Fixes bug 4631.

author: dbertoni
msg: Added support for newer versions of Sun Workshop.

author: dbertoni
msg: Use QName instead of NCName for the name of an instance.  Detect duplicate instances as appropriate.

author: dbertoni
msg: Use QName for retrieving XalanDecimalFormat instances.
